text: I'm absolutely thrilled to share the
launch of our new AWS region in
Hyderabad
the AWS Asia Pacific Hyderabad region is
a second region in India and the 10th
region in Asia Pacific we at AWS India
have a mission
our mission is to empower Builders and
businesses to build a better India let
me say this again our mission in India
is to empower Builders and businesses to
build a better India we truly want to be
a force that moves India forward and the
Investments we're making are a testament
to our commitment to India we
established our presence in India in
2011 and have significantly expanded our
footprint since then in 2016 we launched
the Asia Pacific Mumbai region and in
May 2019 we expanded the region to
include a third availability Zone with
the opening of the new Hyderabad region
we can help hundreds of thousands of
customers in India from Enterprises to
public sector organizations educational
institutions startups non-profits small
and medium businesses and our partners
deploy workloads and leverage Advanced
AWS Technologies with even more
flexibility lower latency and increased
residency the Hyderabad region consists
of three availability zones and will
help our customers running Mission
critical applications and allow them to
launch a variety of use cases seamlessly
customers especially in financial
services Healthcare in energy sectors
can now set up additional deployments in
the Hyderabad region to ensure business
continuity through disaster resilient
architecture customers in public sector
and legal services leading cross-region
and multi-region data backups can now
leverage the new region to ensure
security and protection of critical data
there are several other benefits ranging
from higher application availability to
data residency needs to Future proofing
the architecture which are now all made
possible with the launch of our second
region in India we are very proud to
support our Indian customers many of
whom have been building with us since
the early days of AWS our region is a
commitment and an investment not just in
Cloud architecture but also in skills in
local jobs enabling a more sustainable
future and accelerating economic value
Creation in India we at AWS India are
committed to our mission of moving India
forward we look for over to the
opportunities and Innovation the new
region will unleash for our country and
we remain fully committed to supporting
our customers and partners on their
cloud and digital transformation journey
in India thank you
[Music]
